candidate_description: A student passionate about Artificial Intelligence, Computational Finance and Data Analytics. With a drive for problem-solving and a desire to make a meaningful impact in these dynamic realms.

experience.description: Working in AI research, I contribute actively to industry-level RCC projects, focusing on innovative solutions and real-world applications. My work bridges the gap between academic theory and practical implementation.

Contributed to build an app using Flutter, developing revenue models, achieve a product-market fit in the AI space having a lack of benchmarks in India, doing competitive analysis for further research and development.

projects.name: VaniVikas: Portal For Better Connectivity
projects.description: Developed a secure, smart, and user-friendly portal for Ali Yavar Jung Institute, streamlining patient data management and treatment tracking. It features seamless digital case files, automated case allocation, and real-time treatment updates.

projects.name: PhysioPlay: AI Playground Demo
projects.description: Developing 'PhysioPlay', a persona-based AI system that helps physiotherapy students and doctors enhance their diagnostic skills. Supported by Mozilla India, it offers a platform for hands-on practice and skill development in physiotherapy.

projects.name: SmartSure: Revolutionising Insurance
projects.description: Leveraging AI and advanced analytics, we personalize insurance premiums using fitness data, ML models, and an AI assistant for real-time insights and seamless interaction.

projects.name: Serenity: The New-Age Music App
projects.description: Serenity is a Figma prototype music app with seamless controls, including play/pause, skip, and intuitive swiping. It lets users connect with artist communities, discover music, and live stream concerts with real-time interactions.

projects.name: Linkrr: One-Stop-Solution For Students
projects.description: A platform connecting students with internships, collaborators for research, and small businesses with freelancers for tech, business, and marketing. It fosters global collaboration, empowering students and enabling seamless cross-border opportunities.

projects.name: CheckMate: Your Compliance Buddy
projects.description: Developed entire UI and automation software for automated compliance checking AI tool, with thorough research for UX and AI architecture, understanding the parameters required and the industry requirements.

publications.title: Automated Compliance Checking Of Unstructured Data Using LLMs And Langchain IRJMT

volunteering: Incharge Treasurer, @DJS National Student Data Corps
